p:
Non-galled leaves and rolling galls fixed in FAA ( Johansen, 1940) were dehydrated in an ethanolic series ( Johansen, 1940), critical point dried, mounted on stubs, and covered with 15 nm of gold (Balzers SCD 050) ( Oâ€™Brien and McCully, 1981). The samples were observed in a scanning electron microscope (JEOL JSM - 6360LV) in the Center of Microscopy at the Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais, Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais state, Brazil
1 .
